name: Detective Masochist 2 -The Case of the Tortured Servant-
notes: Should work with the DRM-free version of the game purchased from any site as long as SETUP.EXE is in the base folder of the archive.
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the game archive
game:
  exe: drive_c/U+MePLUS/Doemuo2/SETUP.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:
    executable: $CACHE/SETUP.EXE
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
